law.catch_line: In this subtitle, "judgment" means any final judgment resulting from:...
law.text:
In this subtitle, "judgment" means any final judgment resulting from:
A cause of action for damages arising out of the ownership, maintenance, or use on any highway or other property open to the public of any vehicle of a type required to be registered in this State; or
A cause of action on an agreement of settlement for damages arising out of the ownership, maintenance, or use on any highway or other property open to the public of any vehicle of a type required to be registered in this State.
